item.description:
Creative visualization is a fundamental technique underlying our ability to create our personal reality. Using your thought power to consciously imagine and attract to yourself that which you intend to experience in your life.

In this workshop, you will combine walking meditation, guided meditation and mandala drawing to visualize healing or power symbols with your imagination. Walking meditation will take place within the Mercy Center's labyrinth. Art making, gentle yoga & use of the Mercy center grounds are also included.

Mercy Center is located along with 33 acres of breath-taking, waterfront ocean property in Madison CT.  A beautiful, private beach and peaceful outdoor gardens will be available for our use during, and after the workshop if you should choose to stay longer.

NOTE: This is an outdoor workshop so rain or wet weather conditions will postpone this event to the following day, Sunday May 19. Call 203.901.7393 for more information.


Advanced registration is required. RSVP's close the previous day but a waiting list is available.

The cost for this half-day workshop is $35 per person.
If you register with a friend, you then each pay $25.
item.how_to_find_us: An email will be sent with specific meeting location at Mercy Center.
item.name: Creative Visualization Workshop
